description: An file with .indd extension is an Adobe InDesign project file that contains the page layout information of the project. INDD stands for InDesign Document. These files commonly store page formatting information, books, magazines, newspapers, flyers, brochures or other print media like mobile & webpage mockups. INDD file type is proprietary file format of Adobe and is the default file format for InDesign. Graphic Designers, journalists, marketers, and publishers working with InDesign use this file type.

instructions: INDD files can be converted to several other file formats. The most common conversion is INDD to PDF. InDesign lets you save the INDD file to PDF for sharing with other users. It also lets you export INDD file to JPG, EPS, EPUB, SWF, FLA, HTML, XML, and IDML.
